availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Mullikin (Louisville, Kentucky, druggist and assistant apsys)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, druggist and assistant assessor. Kentucky native. Son of Sarah Mullikin. Married to Sallie A. DeCue. Father of A. D. Mullikin. Druggist in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Assistant assessor in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 7, p. 362A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 307.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 152A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994040, Jefferson County Births.
"George Mullikin (1823-1888)," Find A Grave, Memorial 173255245, accessed August 24, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/173255245.
